<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <XtraReportsLayoutSerializer SerializerVersion="15.2.9.0" Ref="1" ControlType="Hedgehog.Infrastructure.Reports.HedgehogReport, Hedgehog.ReportEngine, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=6310a94c1eeb7c31" Name="_report" DisplayName="Completion Rate Report" ScriptsSource="
private void SetNullSummaryResultText(object sender, DevExpress.XtraReports.UI.PrintOnPageEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;

	if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(label.Text))
	{
		label.Text = "N/A";
	}
}

private void GetRiskRatingDisplayText(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	
	if (label.Text == "Invalid")
	{
		label.Text = "Unassessed";
	}
	
	label.Text = label.Text += " Risk";
}

private void GetRiskRatingSummaryDisplayText(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	
	if (label.Text == "Invalid")
	{
		label.Text = "Unassessed";
	}
	
	label.Text = string.Format("Total {0} Risk:", label.Text);
}

Report.Definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <XtraReportsLayoutSerializer SerializerVersion="15.2.9.0" Ref="1" ControlType="Hedgehog.Infrastructure.Reports.HedgehogReport, Hedgehog.ReportEngine, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=6310a94c1eeb7c31" Name="_report" DisplayName="Listing - All Infractions" ScriptsSource="private void ToLocalTime(object sender, DevExpress.XtraReports.UI.BindingEventArgs e)
{
	if (e.Value == null)
		return;

	if (e.Value.GetType() != typeof(DateTimeOffset))
	{
		XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;

		string message = "Value is not bound to a DateTimeOffset. Report = " + label.RootReport.DisplayName + " Label = " + label.Name + " Type = " + e.Value.GetType().ToString() + " Value = " + e.Value.ToString();
		throw new ArgumentException(message);
	}

	DateTimeOffset beforeConverted = (DateTimeOffset) e.Value;
	e.Value = beforeConverted .ToLocalTime();
}

private void label6_EvaluateBinding(object sender, DevExpress.XtraReports.UI.BindingEventArgs e)
{
	ToLocalTime(sender, e);
}

private void label20_EvaluateBinding(object sender, DevExpress.XtraReports.UI.BindingEventArgs e)
{
	ToLocalTime(sender, e);
}

Report.Name: Listing - All Infractions

Report.Definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <XtraReportsLayoutSerializer SerializerVersion="15.2.9.0" Ref="1" ControlType="Hedgehog.Infrastructure.Reports.HedgehogReport, Hedgehog.ReportEngine, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=6310a94c1eeb7c31" Name="_report" DisplayName="Completion Rate Audit Report" ScriptsSource="
private void SetNullSummaryResultText(object sender, DevExpress.XtraReports.UI.PrintOnPageEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;

	if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(label.Text))
	{
		label.Text = "N/A";
	}
}

private void GetRiskRatingDisplayText(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	
	if (label.Text == "Invalid")
	{
		label.Text = "Unassessed";
	}
	
	label.Text = label.Text += " Risk";
}

private void GetRiskRatingSummaryDisplayText(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	
	if (label.Text == "Invalid")
	{
		label.Text = "Unassessed";
	}
	
	label.Text = string.Format("Total {0} Risk:", label.Text);
}

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <XtraReportsLayoutSerializer SerializerVersion="15.2.9.0" Ref="1" ControlType="Hedgehog.Infrastructure.Reports.HedgehogReport, Hedgehog.ReportEngine, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=6310a94c1eeb7c31" Name="hedgehogReport1" DisplayName="Mailing Labels - Inspected Facilities (Avery 5161)" ScriptsSource="private void address_PrintOnPage(object sender, DevExpress.XtraReports.UI.PrintOnPageEventArgs e) {
 XRLabel lbl = (XRLabel) sender;
 String text = lbl.Text;
 text = text.Replace(", ", "\r\n");
 lbl.Text = text;
}

Report.Definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <XtraReportsLayoutSerializer SerializerVersion="15.2.9.0" Ref="1" ControlType="Hedgehog.Infrastructure.Reports.HedgehogReport, Hedgehog.ReportEngine, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=6310a94c1eeb7c31" Name="hedgehogReport1" DisplayName="Uninspected Facility Listing" ScriptsSource="private void checkIfEmpty(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e) {
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	string name = label.Name;
	if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(label.Text) && name.StartsWith("g"))
		label.Text = "Unassessed Total:";
	else if(String.IsNullOrEmpty(label.Text))
		label.Text = "Unassessed";
}

private void title_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e) {
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	DateTime date = (DateTime) label.Tag;
	label.Text += " (Since: " + date.ToString("dd-MMM-yyyy") + ")";
}

private void lastInspectionDate_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e) {
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(label.Text))
		label.Text = "Never";
}

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <XtraReportsLayoutSerializer SerializerVersion="15.2.9.0" Ref="1" ControlType="Hedgehog.Infrastructure.Reports.HedgehogReport, Hedgehog.ReportEngine, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=6310a94c1eeb7c31" Name="_report" DisplayName="Infraction Action Plan" ScriptsSource="using Hedgehog.Model;
using Hedgerow.Extensions;

private void SourceDescriptionLabel_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;

	InfractionComment comment = (InfractionComment) CommentsSubReport.GetCurrentRow();

	label.Text = EnumEx.GetDisplayName(comment.Source);
}

private void CreateOcpReadingsDisplayText(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
 XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;

 Reading reading = (Reading) ReadingsSubReport.GetCurrentRow();

 label.Text = string.Format("{0} {1} {2} {3}",
	reading.ItemMeasured, reading.Value, reading.Unit.Description, reading.Location);
}

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <XtraReportsLayoutSerializer SerializerVersion="15.2.9.0" Ref="1" ControlType="Hedgehog.Infrastructure.Reports.HedgehogReport, Hedgehog.ReportEngine, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=6310a94c1eeb7c31" Name="hedgehogReport1" DisplayName="CCFL Licence" ScriptsSource="
private void TruncateFacilityNumber(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel lbl = (XRLabel) sender;
	string text = lbl.Text;
	
	if (text.Contains("["))
		lbl.Text = text.Substring(0, text.LastIndexOf('['));
}

Report.Definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <XtraReportsLayoutSerializer SerializerVersion="15.2.9.0" Ref="1" ControlType="Hedgehog.Infrastructure.Reports.HedgehogReport, Hedgehog.ReportEngine, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=6310a94c1eeb7c31" Name="hedgehogReport1" DisplayName="Summary - All Inspections (Hazard Rating)" ScriptsSource="using System.Collections.Generic;
using Hedgehog.DigestModel;

Dictionary<string, double> counters = new Dictionary<string, double>();
int g1RunningTotal = 0;
int g2RunningTotal = 0;
int rRunningTotal = 0;

private void createDictionary(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e) {
	string[] keys = new string[] {
		"unassessed", "g2Unassessed", "g1Unassessed", "rUnassessed",
		"low", "g2Low", "g1Low", "rLow", 
		"moderate", "g2Moderate", "g1Moderate", "rModerate", 
		"high", "g2High", "g1High", "rHigh"
	};
	
	for (int i = 0; i < keys.Length; i++)
		counters.Add(keys[i], 0);
}

private void rowChanged(object sender, System.EventArgs e) {
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	string name = label.Name;

	string hazard = ((InspectionDigest) GetCurrentRow()).HazardRating.ToString();
	
	if (hazard == "Invalid")
		hazard = "unassessed";

	List<string> keys = new List<string>(counters.Keys);

	foreach (string key in keys) {
		if (key.EndsWith(hazard, true, null))
			counters[key]++;
	}

	g1RunningTotal++;
	g2RunningTotal++;
	rRunningTotal++;
}

private void getCount(object sender, DevExpress.XtraReports.UI.SummaryGetResultEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	string name = label.Name;
	e.Result = counters[name];
	e.Handled = true;
}

private void getPercent(object sender, DevExpress.XtraReports.UI.SummaryGetResultEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	string name = label.Name;
	name = name.Remove(name.IndexOf("Percent"));
	double divisor = counters["unassessed"] + counters["low"] + counters["moderate"] + counters["high"];
	double result = 0;
	if (divisor > 0)
		result = (counters[name] * 100) / divisor;

	if (result < 0.1 && result > 0)
		e.Result = "<0.1";
	else {
		result = Math.Round(result, 1);
		e.Result = result;
	}
	
	e.Handled = true;
}

private void getGroupPercent(object sender, DevExpress.XtraReports.UI.SummaryGetResultEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	string name = label.Name;
	name = name.Remove(name.IndexOf("Percent"));
	double divisor = 0;
	double result = 0;

	if (name.StartsWith("g1"))
		divisor = g1RunningTotal;
	else if (name.StartsWith("g2"))
		divisor = g2RunningTotal;
	else if (name.StartsWith("r"))
		divisor = rRunningTotal;

	if (divisor > 0)
		result = (counters[name] * 100) / divisor;
	
	if (result < 0.1 && result > 0)
		e.Result = "<0.1";
	else {
		result = Math.Round(result, 1);
		e.Result = result;
	}
	e.Handled = true;
}

private void reset(object sender, System.EventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	string name = label.Name;
	counters[name] = 0;
}

private void groupReset(object sender, System.EventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	string name = label.Name;

	if (name.StartsWith("g1"))
		g1RunningTotal = 0;
	else if (name.StartsWith("g2"))
		g2RunningTotal = 0;
}

private void checkIfEmpty(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	string name = label.Name;
	if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(label.Text) && name.StartsWith("g"))
		label.Text = "Unassigned Total:";
	else if(String.IsNullOrEmpty(label.Text))
		label.Text = "Unassigned";
}

Report.Description: Breakdown of inspections by their resulting hazard ratings, and the facility type.
Report.Name: Summary - All Inspections (Hazard Rating)

Report.Definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <XtraReportsLayoutSerializer SerializerVersion="15.2.9.0" Ref="1" ControlType="Hedgehog.Infrastructure.Reports.HedgehogReport, Hedgehog.ReportEngine, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=6310a94c1eeb7c31" Name="hedgehogReport1" DisplayName="Observational Inspection Report" ScriptsSource="using System.Drawing;
using DevExpress.XtraPrinting.Drawing;
using DevExpress.XtraReports.UI;
using Hedgehog.Model;
using System.Linq;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.IO;
using Hedgerow.Extensions;

int i = 0;

private void PageHeader_BeforePrint(object sender, PrintEventArgs e) {
 i++;
 if (i == 1)
 e.Cancel = true;
}

private void cancelPrint(object sender, PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel l = (XRLabel) sender;

	if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(l.Text))
	{
		e.Cancel = true;
	}
}

private void status_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
 	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
 	
	Inspection inspection = (Inspection) hedgehogReport1.GetCurrentRow();

 	if (inspection.Status == InspectionStatus.Voided)
	{
 		hedgehogReport1.Watermark.Text = "VOID";
 		hedgehogReport1.Watermark.TextTransparency = 150;
 		hedgehogReport1.Watermark.ForeColor = Color.Red;
 	}
	else if (inspection.Status == InspectionStatus.Invalid || inspection.Status == InspectionStatus.Open)
	{
 		hedgehogReport1.Watermark.Text = "DRAFT";
 		hedgehogReport1.Watermark.ForeColor = Color.Black;
 		hedgehogReport1.Watermark.TextTransparency = 200;
 	}
	else
	{
 		hedgehogReport1.Watermark.Text = "";
 	}
}

private void cancelPrintIfNullTag(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e) {
 XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
 object t = label.Tag;
 if (t == null)
 e.Cancel = true;
}

private readonly string[] _pictureFormats = { ".jpg", ".jpeg", ".tiff", ".tif", ".png", ".gif", ".bmp" };

private readonly string _fileNotFoundMessage = "This attachment either couldn't be downloaded or was removed from the server. " +
	"If working offline, try running this report again when online.";

private readonly string _invalidImageFormatMessage = "This attachment is either not an image, or is an invalid image format.";

private void SetAttachmentErrorText(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRPictureBox picture = (XRPictureBox) sender;

	string errorText = "";
	string imageUrl = "";

	Note note = (Note) Attachments.GetCurrentRow();

	if (note != null)
	{
		string extension = Path.GetExtension(note.OriginalFileName);
	
		string fileName = note.Id + extension;

		imageUrl = Path.Combine(Parameters["AttachmentsRoot"].Value.ToString(), fileName);	
	
		if (!_pictureFormats.Contains(extension))
		{
			errorText = _invalidImageFormatMessage;
		}
		else if (!File.Exists(imageUrl))
		{
			errorText = _fileNotFoundMessage;
		}
	}
	else
	{
		errorText = _fileNotFoundMessage;
	}

	if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(errorText))
	{
		AttachmentErrorText.Text = errorText;
		AttachmentErrorText.Visible = true;

		picture.Height = 0;
		AttachmentsDetail.Height = 75;

	}
	else
	{
		AttachmentErrorText.Visible = false;

		picture.Height = 365;
		AttachmentsDetail.Height = 415;

		picture.ImageUrl = imageUrl;
	}
}

private void closingCommentsLabel_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(closingComments.Text))
	{
		e.Cancel = true;
	}
}

private void openingCommentsLabel_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e) 
{
	if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(openingComments.Text))
	{
		e.Cancel = true;
	}
}

private void FacilityTypeHeaderLabel_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;

	InspectionPage page = (InspectionPage) PagesSubReport.GetCurrentRow();

	FacilityTypeAttribute facilityTypeAttribute = page.FacilityTypeAttribute;

	if (facilityTypeAttribute != null)
	{
		label.Text = string.Format("{0} - {1}", facilityTypeLabel.Text, facilityTypeAttribute.Description);
	}
	else
	{
		label.Text = facilityTypeLabel.Text;
	}
}

private void AdherenceReason_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;

	InspectionPage page = (InspectionPage) PagesSubReport.GetCurrentRow();

	InspectionModelQuestion modelQuestion = (InspectionModelQuestion) QuestionsSubReport.GetCurrentRow();

	InspectionAdherenceReason adherenceReason =
		page.AdherenceReasons.FirstOrDefault(ar => ar.InspectionModelQuestionId == modelQuestion.Id);

	if (adherenceReason != null)
	{
		label.Text = EnumEx.GetDisplayName(adherenceReason.AdherenceReason);
	}
	else
	{
		e.Cancel = true;
	}
}

private void CancelPrintIfResolutionLabelIsEmpty(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;

	Infraction infraction = (Infraction) InfractionsSubReport.GetCurrentRow();
	
	if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(ResolutionCommentLabel.Text) || !infraction.CorrectedDuringInspection)
	{
		e.Cancel = true;
	}
}

private void InfractionDetail_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	InspectionModelQuestion modelQuestion = (InspectionModelQuestion) QuestionsSubReport.GetCurrentRow();

	Infraction infraction = (Infraction) InfractionsSubReport.GetCurrentRow();

	if (infraction == null || infraction.ModelQuestionId != modelQuestion.Id)
	{
		e.Cancel = true;
	}
}

private void SeverityTextLabel_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;

	Infraction infraction = (Infraction) InfractionsSubReport.GetCurrentRow();

	string severityText = string.Empty;

	if (infraction != null)
	{
		if (infraction.Severity != null && !string.IsNullOrEmpty(infraction.Severity.Description))
		{
			severityText = infraction.Severity.Description;
		}
		else if (infraction.RegulationCannedComment != null && !string.IsNullOrEmpty(infraction.RegulationCannedComment.Severity))
		{
			severityText = infraction.RegulationCannedComment.Severity;
		}
		else
		{
			severityText = string.Empty;
		}	
	}

	if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(severityText))
	{
		label.Text = string.Format("Severity: {0}", severityText);
	}
}

private void GetReadingsDisplayText(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;

	Reading reading = (Reading) ReadingsSubReport.GetCurrentRow();

	string takenTimeString = reading.TakenDateTime.ToLocalTime().ToString("dd-MMM-yyyy HH:mm");

 string location = !string.IsNullOrEmpty(reading.Location)
		? string.Format(" at {0}", reading.Location)
		: string.Empty;

	label.Text = string.Format("- {0} - {1}{2}: {3}{4}",
		takenTimeString, reading.ItemMeasured, location, reading.Value, reading.Unit.Description);
}

 XRLabel lbl = (XRLabel) sender;
 String text = lbl.Text;
 text = text.Replace(", ", "\r\n");
 lbl.Text = text;
}

Report.Definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <XtraReportsLayoutSerializer SerializerVersion="15.2.9.0" Ref="1" ControlType="Hedgehog.Infrastructure.Reports.HedgehogReport, Hedgehog.ReportEngine, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=6310a94c1eeb7c31" Name="hedgehogReport1" DisplayName="Issue Profile" ScriptsSource="using Hedgehog.Model;
using Hedgerow.Extensions;
using System.Text.RegularExpressions;

private void resolvedCheckBox_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRCheckBox resolvedCheckBox = (XRCheckBox) sender;

	NexusIssue nexusIssue = (NexusIssue) hedgehogReport1.GetCurrentRow();

	if (nexusIssue.Status == NexusIssueStatus.Closed)
	{
		resolvedCheckBox.Checked = true;
	}
	else
	{
		resolvedCheckBox.Checked = false;
	}
}

private void openCheckBox_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRCheckBox openCheckBox = (XRCheckBox) sender;

	NexusIssue nexusIssue = (NexusIssue) hedgehogReport1.GetCurrentRow();

	if (nexusIssue.Status == NexusIssueStatus.Open)
	{
		openCheckBox.Checked = true;
	}
	else
	{
		openCheckBox.Checked = false;
	}
}

private void issueDescrip_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;

	try{
	ActivitySource source = (ActivitySource) Enum.Parse(typeof (ActivitySource), label.Text);

	if (source == ActivitySource.AddAnimalInvolved)
	{
		Activity activity = (Activity) Activities.GetCurrentRow();

		AnimalInvolved animal = activity.AnimalInvolved;

		label.Text = string.Format("Animal Involved Added (#{0})", animal.Number);
	}
	else if (source == ActivitySource.AddPersonInvolved)
	{
		Activity activity = (Activity) Activities.GetCurrentRow();
		PersonInvolved person = activity.PersonInvolved;
		label.Text = string.Format("Person Involved Added (#{0})", person.Number);
	}
	/*else if (source == ActivitySource.NewIssue)
	{
 		e.Cancel = true;
	}*/
	/*else if (source == ActivitySource.AddComment)
	{
 		Activity activity = (Activity) Activities.GetCurrentRow();
		ActivityType type = activity.ActivityType;
		label.Text = string.Format("{0} Activity Added", activity.ActivityType);
	}*/
	else
	{
		label.Text = EnumEx.GetDisplayName((ActivitySource) source);
	}

	}
	catch{
		label.Text = null;	//no activity
	}
}

private void ConfinementLocation_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;

	AnimalDetentionLocationType type =
		(AnimalDetentionLocationType) Enum.Parse(typeof (AnimalDetentionLocationType), label.Text);

	if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(confineDate.Text))
	{
		label.Text = null;
	}
	else if (type == AnimalDetentionLocationType.Other)
	{
		AnimalInvolved animal = (AnimalInvolved) AnimalsInvolved.GetCurrentRow();

		label.Text = animal.AnimalDetentionLocationOther;
	}
	else
	{
		label.Text = EnumEx.GetDisplayName((AnimalDetentionLocationType) type);
	}
}

private void ActivityContact_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;

	try{
	Activity activity = (Activity) Activities.GetCurrentRow();

	if (activity.Resolution != null)
	{
		label.Text = string.Format("Resolution Reason: {0}", activity.Resolution.Description);
	}
	else
	{
		if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(activity.ContactName)
		 || !string.IsNullOrEmpty(activity.ContactPhone))
		{
			label.Text = string.Format("Contact: {0} {1}", activity.ContactName, activity.ContactPhone);
		}
		else
		{
			label.Text = null;
		}
	}

	}
	catch
	{
		label.Text = null;	//no activity
	}
}

private void PersonInvolvedWeight_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;

	PersonInvolved person = (PersonInvolved) PersonsInvolved.GetCurrentRow();

	if (person.Weight == 0)
	{
		//e.Cancel = true;
		label.Text = "Unknown"; //
	}
	else if (person.IsWeightInlbs)
	{
		label.Text = string.Format("{0}lbs", person.Weight);
	}
	else
	{
		label.Text = string.Format("{0}kg", person.Weight);
	}
}

private const long TicksPerMeanMonth = 26297460000000; // = 30.436875 Days * TicksPerDay

		age.Years = (ageInMeanMonths - age.Months) / 12;

	}

	return age;
}*/

private void SetYearsOwnedText(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	AnimalInvolved animal = (AnimalInvolved) AnimalsInvolved.GetCurrentRow();

	if (!isNotWild.Checked)
	{
		YearsOwned.Text = null;
	}
	else if (animal != null && (animal.YearsOwned.HasValue || animal.MonthsOwned.HasValue))
	{
		YearsOwned.Text = string.Format("{0} years {1} months",
			animal.YearsOwned.GetValueOrDefault(0), animal.MonthsOwned.GetValueOrDefault(0));
	}
	else
	{
		YearsOwned.Text = "Unknown";
	}
}

private void activityTypeLabel_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	
	try{
	Activity activity = (Activity) Activities.GetCurrentRow();

	if (activity.ActivityType == null)
	{
		label.Text = null;	//no activity
	}

	}
	catch
	{
		e.Cancel = true;
	}
}

private void riskRatingLabel_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	if (riskRatingLabel.Text == "Invalid")
	{
		riskRatingLabel.Text = "Unassessed";
	}
}


//Deltas
private void ActivityDeltaDateTime_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	DateTime temp;

	if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(label.Text) && !String.IsNullOrEmpty(prevValue.Text))
	{
		label.Text = prevValue.Text+" removed";
	}

	if (DateTime.TryParse(label.Text, out temp))
	{
		label.Text = temp.ToString("dd-MMM-yy h:mm tt");			
	}

}
private void ActivityDeltaDescription_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	string temp = Regex.Replace(label.Text, "(\\B[A-Z])", " $1");
	label.Text = temp.Replace("."," ");
}

private void ConvertDate_BeforePrint(object sender, PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	if (label.Tag == null)
		return;

	if (label.Tag.GetType() != typeof(DateTimeOffset))
		throw new ArgumentException("Tag is not bound to a DateTimeOffset");

	DateTimeOffset beforeConverted= new DateTimeOffset();
	DateTimeOffset convertedDate = new DateTimeOffset();
	beforeConverted = (DateTimeOffset) label.Tag;
	convertedDate = beforeConverted.ToLocalTime();
	label.Text = convertedDate.ToString("dd MMM yy hh:mm tt");
//	label.Text = ConvertTimeToLocalTime.ConvertToLocalDateTime(label.Tag);
}

private void label33_EvaluateBinding(object sender, DevExpress.XtraReports.UI.BindingEventArgs e)
{
	ToLocalTime(sender, e);
}

private void ToLocalTime(object sender, DevExpress.XtraReports.UI.BindingEventArgs e)
{
	if (e.Value == null)
		return;

	if (e.Value.GetType() != typeof(DateTimeOffset))
	{
		XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;

		string message = "Value is not bound to a DateTimeOffset. Report = " + label.RootReport.DisplayName + " Label = " + label.Name + " Type = " + e.Value.GetType().ToString() + " Value = " + e.Value.ToString();
		throw new ArgumentException(message);
	}

	DateTimeOffset beforeConverted = (DateTimeOffset) e.Value;
	e.Value = beforeConverted .ToLocalTime();
}

private void label18_EvaluateBinding(object sender, DevExpress.XtraReports.UI.BindingEventArgs e)
{
	ToLocalTime(sender, e);
}

private void label17_EvaluateBinding(object sender, DevExpress.XtraReports.UI.BindingEventArgs e)
{
	ToLocalTime(sender, e);
}

Report.Description: Displays detail and the history-to-date of a Nexus Issue.
Report.Name: Issue Profile

Report.Definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <XtraReportsLayoutSerializer SerializerVersion="15.2.9.0" Ref="1" ControlType="Hedgehog.Infrastructure.Reports.HedgehogReport, Hedgehog.ReportEngine, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=6310a94c1eeb7c31" Name="hedgehogReport1" DisplayName="Water Sample Requisition Form" ScriptsSource="using System.Collections.Generic;

//dictionary of count summaries
Dictionary<string, double> counters = new Dictionary<string, double>();
int g1RunningTotal = 0;
int g2RunningTotal = 0;
int rRunningTotal = 0;

//fill dictionary
private void createDictionary(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e) {
	string[] keys = new string[] {
		"unassessed", "g2Unassessed", "g1Unassessed", "rUnassessed",
		"low", "g2Low", "g1Low", "rLow", 
		"moderate", "g2Moderate", "g1Moderate", "rModerate", 
		"high", "g2High", "g1High", "rHigh"
	};
	
	for (int i = 0; i < keys.Length; i++)
		counters.Add(keys[i], 0);
}

//increment counts
private void rowChanged(object sender, System.EventArgs e) {
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	string name = label.Name;
	string risk = GetCurrentColumnValue("RiskRating").ToString();

	if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(risk))
		risk = "unassessed";

	List<string> keys = new List<string>(counters.Keys);

	foreach (string key in keys) {
		if (key.EndsWith(risk, true, null))
			counters[key]++;
	}

	g1RunningTotal++;
	g2RunningTotal++;
	rRunningTotal++;
}

//get count summary
private void getCount(object sender, DevExpress.XtraReports.UI.SummaryGetResultEventArgs e) {
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	string name = label.Name;
	e.Result = counters[name];
	e.Handled = true;
}

//calculate percentage
private void getPercent(object sender, DevExpress.XtraReports.UI.SummaryGetResultEventArgs e) {
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	string name = label.Name;
	name = name.Remove(name.IndexOf("Percent"));
	double divisor = counters["unassessed"] + counters["low"] + counters["moderate"] + counters["high"];
	double result = 0;
	if (divisor > 0)
		result = (counters[name] * 100) / divisor;

	if (result < 0.1 && result > 0)
		e.Result = "<0.1";
	else {
		result = Math.Round(result, 1);
		e.Result = result;
	}
	
	e.Handled = true;
}

private void getGroupPercent(object sender, DevExpress.XtraReports.UI.SummaryGetResultEventArgs e) {
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	string name = label.Name;
	name = name.Remove(name.IndexOf("Percent"));
	double divisor = 0;
	double result = 0;

	if (name.StartsWith("g1"))
		divisor = g1RunningTotal;
	else if (name.StartsWith("g2"))
		divisor = g2RunningTotal;
	else if (name.StartsWith("r"))
		divisor = rRunningTotal;

	if (divisor > 0)
		result = (counters[name] * 100) / divisor;
	
	if (result < 0.1 && result > 0)
		e.Result = "<0.1";
	else {
		result = Math.Round(result, 1);
		e.Result = result;
	}
	e.Handled = true;
}

//reset count
private void reset(object sender, System.EventArgs e) {
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	string name = label.Name;
	counters[name] = 0;
}

private void groupReset(object sender, System.EventArgs e) {
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	string name = label.Name;

	if (name.StartsWith("g1"))
		g1RunningTotal = 0;
	else if (name.StartsWith("g2"))
		g2RunningTotal = 0;
}

private void checkIfEmpty(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e) {
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	string name = label.Name;
	if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(label.Text) && name.StartsWith("g"))
		label.Text = "Unassigned Total:";
	else if(String.IsNullOrEmpty(label.Text))
		label.Text = "Unassigned";
}

Report.Description: Prints a requisition form for each facility in the management center grid.
Report.Name: Water Sample Requisition Form

Report.Definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <XtraReportsLayoutSerializer SerializerVersion="15.2.9.0" Ref="1" ControlType="Hedgehog.Infrastructure.Reports.HedgehogReport, Hedgehog.ReportEngine, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=6310a94c1eeb7c31" Name="hedgehogReport1" DisplayName="Invoice Report" ScriptsSource="private void TruncateSiteAddress(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{	
	string text = ((XRLabel)sender).Text;
	
	Graphics gr = Graphics.FromHwnd(IntPtr.Zero);
	gr.PageUnit = GraphicsUnit.Inch;

	SizeF size = gr.MeasureString(text, ((XRLabel)sender).Font);

	if (size.Width > 4 && text.Length >= 83 && !string.IsNullOrEmpty(text))
	{
		((XRLabel)sender).Text = text.Remove(82) + "...)";
	}

	gr.Dispose();
}

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <XtraReportsLayoutSerializer SerializerVersion="12.2.4.0" Ref="1" Name="hedgehogReport1" ControlType="Hedgehog.Infrastructure.Reports.HedgehogReport, Hedgehog.ReportEngine, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=6310a94c1eeb7c31" DataSource="#Ref-0" Version="12.2" Font="Arial, 9.75pt" ScriptsSource="private void checkIfEmpty(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e) {
 XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
 string name = label.Name;
 if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(label.Text) && name.StartsWith("g"))
 label.Text = "Unassessed Total:";
 else if(String.IsNullOrEmpty(label.Text))
 label.Text = "Unassessed";
}

}

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <XtraReportsLayoutSerializer SerializerVersion="15.2.9.0" Ref="1" ControlType="Hedgehog.Infrastructure.Reports.HedgehogReport, Hedgehog.ReportEngine, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=6310a94c1eeb7c31" Name="hedgehogReport1" DisplayName="Detail - All Facilities" ScriptsSource="private void checkIfEmpty(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e) {
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	string name = label.Name;
	if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(label.Text) && name.StartsWith("g"))
		label.Text = "Unassessed Total:";
	else if(String.IsNullOrEmpty(label.Text))
		label.Text = "Unassessed";
}

Report.Name: Listing - All Facilities

Report.Definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <XtraReportsLayoutSerializer SerializerVersion="15.2.9.0" Ref="1" ControlType="Hedgehog.Infrastructure.Reports.HedgehogReport, Hedgehog.ReportEngine, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=6310a94c1eeb7c31" Name="_report" DisplayName="Infraction Report" ScriptsSource="using Hedgehog.Model;
using Hedgerow.Extensions;

private void SourceDescriptionLabel_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;

	InfractionComment comment = (InfractionComment) CommentsSubReport.GetCurrentRow();

	label.Text = EnumEx.GetDisplayName(comment.Source);
}

private void SeverityLabel_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;

	Infraction infraction = (Infraction) _report.GetCurrentRow();

	if (infraction.Severity != null)
 {
		label.Text = infraction.Severity.Description;
	}
	else if (infraction.RegulationCannedComment != null &&
 	!string.IsNullOrEmpty(infraction.RegulationCannedComment.Severity))
	{
		label.Text = infraction.RegulationCannedComment.Severity;
	}
}

Report.Description: Details about a particular infraction and it's comments and readings.
Report.Name: Infraction Report

Report.Definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <XtraReportsLayoutSerializer SerializerVersion="15.2.9.0" Ref="1" ControlType="Hedgehog.Infrastructure.Reports.HedgehogReport, Hedgehog.ReportEngine, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=6310a94c1eeb7c31" Name="hedgehogReport1" DisplayName="Inspection Report" ScriptsSource="using System.Drawing;
using DevExpress.XtraPrinting.Drawing;
using DevExpress.XtraReports.UI;
using Hedgehog.Model;
using Hedgehog.Infrastructure.Reports;
using System.Linq;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.IO;

private void highlightAnswer(object sender, DevExpress.XtraReports.UI.PrintOnPageEventArgs e)
{
 	XRLabel lbl = (XRLabel) sender;

 	if (lbl.Text == "No")
 	{
 		lbl.ForeColor = Color.Red;
 	lbl.Font = new Font("Arial", 9.75F, FontStyle.Bold);
 		count++;
 	}
}

private void correctedDuringInspection(object sender, PrintEventArgs e)
{
 	XRCheckBox cb = (XRCheckBox) sender;

 	if (cb.Checked)
 		cb.Visible = true;
 	else
 		cb.Visible = false;
}

String currentAnswer = "";
int count = 0;

private void answerTest_GetValue(object sender, DevExpress.XtraReports.UI.GetValueEventArgs e)
{
 if (answer.Text == "No") 
 	count++;
}

int i = 0;

private void PageHeader_BeforePrint(object sender, PrintEventArgs e)
{
 	i++;

 	if (i == 1)
 		e.Cancel = true;
}

private void cancelPrint(object sender, PrintEventArgs e)
{
 	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;

 	if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(label.Text))
 		e.Cancel = true;
}

private void status_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
 	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
 	
	Inspection inspection = (Inspection) hedgehogReport1.GetCurrentRow();

 	if (inspection.Status == InspectionStatus.Voided)
	{
 		hedgehogReport1.Watermark.Text = "VOID";
 		hedgehogReport1.Watermark.TextTransparency = 150;
 		hedgehogReport1.Watermark.ForeColor = Color.Red;
 	}
	else if (inspection.Status == InspectionStatus.Invalid || inspection.Status == InspectionStatus.Open)
	{
 		hedgehogReport1.Watermark.Text = "DRAFT";
 		hedgehogReport1.Watermark.ForeColor = Color.Black;
 		hedgehogReport1.Watermark.TextTransparency = 200;
 	}
	else
	{
 		hedgehogReport1.Watermark.Text = "";
 	}
}

private void cancelPrintIfNullTag(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
 	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
 	object t = label.Tag;

 	if (t == null)
 		e.Cancel = true;
}

private readonly string[] _pictureFormats = { ".jpg", ".jpeg", ".tiff", ".tif", ".png", ".gif", ".bmp" };

private readonly string _fileNotFoundMessage = "This attachment either couldn't be downloaded or was removed from the server. " +
	"If working offline, try running this report again when online.";

private readonly string _invalidImageFormatMessage = "This attachment is either not an image, or is an invalid image format.";

private void SetAttachmentErrorText(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRPictureBox picture = (XRPictureBox) sender;

	string errorText = "";
	string imageUrl = "";

	Note note = (Note) Attachments.GetCurrentRow();

	if (note != null)
	{
		string extension = Path.GetExtension(note.OriginalFileName);
	
		if (!_pictureFormats.Contains(extension))
		{
			errorText = _invalidImageFormatMessage;
		}
		else if (!File.Exists(note.AttachmentPath))
		{
			errorText = _fileNotFoundMessage;
		}
	}
	else
	{
		errorText = _fileNotFoundMessage;
	}

	if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(errorText))
	{
		AttachmentErrorText.Text = errorText;
		AttachmentErrorText.Visible = true;

		picture.Height = 0;
		AttachmentsDetail.Height = 75;

	}
	else
	{
		AttachmentErrorText.Visible = false;

		picture.Height = 365;
		AttachmentsDetail.Height = 415;

		picture.ImageUrl = note.AttachmentPath;
	}
}

private int _questionNumber = 1;

private void QuestionNumberLabel_AfterPrint(object sender, System.EventArgs e)
{
	SetAndIncrementQuestionNumber();
}

private void QuestionNumberLabel_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	if (_questionNumber == 1)
	{
		SetAndIncrementQuestionNumber();
	}
}

private void SetAndIncrementQuestionNumber()
{
	QuestionNumberLabel.Text = string.Format("{0}.", _questionNumber);

	_questionNumber++;
}

private void inspectionReasonsLabel_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	e.Cancel = string.IsNullOrEmpty(inspectionReasons.Text);
}

private void closingCommentsLabel_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	e.Cancel = string.IsNullOrEmpty(closingComments.Text);
}

private void openingCommentsLabel_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e) 
{
	e.Cancel = string.IsNullOrEmpty(openingComments.Text);
}

private void FacilityTypeHeaderLabel_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;

	InspectionPage page = (InspectionPage) PagesSubReport.GetCurrentRow();

	FacilityTypeAttribute facilityTypeAttribute = page.FacilityTypeAttribute;

	if (facilityTypeAttribute != null)
	{
		label.Text = string.Format("{0} - {1}", facilityTypeLabel.Text, facilityTypeAttribute.Description);
	}
	else
	{
		label.Text = facilityTypeLabel.Text;
	}
}

private void GetReadingsDisplayText(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;

	Reading reading = (Reading) ReadingsSubReport.GetCurrentRow();

	string takenTimeString = reading.TakenDateTime.ToLocalTime().ToString("dd-MMM-yyyy HH:mm");

 string location = !string.IsNullOrEmpty(reading.Location)
		? string.Format(" at {0}", reading.Location)
		: string.Empty;

	label.Text = string.Format("- {0} - {1}{2}: {3}{4}",
		takenTimeString, reading.ItemMeasured, location, reading.Value, reading.Unit.Description);
}

private void amLabel2_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e) 
{
	if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(attachmentLabel.Text))
	{
		amLabel2.Text = "Amendments - Notes";
	}
}

private void CertifiedProfessionalLabel_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{	
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	
	if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(label.Text))
	{
		label.Text = "Certified Professionals:";
	}
	else
	{
		label.Text += ":";
	}
}

private void SeverityLabel_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;

	if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(label.Text))
	{
		label.Text = string.Format("Severity: {0}", label.Text);
	}
	else
	{
		e.Cancel = true;
	}
}

private void followUpDate_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;

	InspectionQuestion question = (InspectionQuestion) QuestionsSubReport.GetCurrentRow();

	if (question.FollowUpDate == null)
	{
		label.Height = 0;
		label.Text = string.Empty;
	}
}

private void ToLocalTime(object sender, DevExpress.XtraReports.UI.BindingEventArgs e)
{
	if (e.Value == null)
		return;

	if (e.Value.GetType() != typeof(DateTimeOffset))
	{
		XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;

		string message = "Value is not bound to a DateTimeOffset. Report = " + label.RootReport.DisplayName + " Label = " + label.Name + " Type = " + e.Value.GetType().ToString() + " Value = " + e.Value.ToString();
		throw new ArgumentException(message);
	}

	DateTimeOffset beforeConverted = (DateTimeOffset) e.Value;
	e.Value = beforeConverted .ToLocalTime();
}

Report.Description: Displays the results of an inspection.
Report.Name: Inspection Report

Report.Definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <XtraReportsLayoutSerializer SerializerVersion="15.2.9.0" Ref="1" ControlType="Hedgehog.Infrastructure.Reports.HedgehogReport, Hedgehog.ReportEngine, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=6310a94c1eeb7c31" Name="hedgehogReport1" DisplayName="Inspection Report (Non-Compliant Questions)" ScriptsSource="using System.Drawing;
using DevExpress.XtraPrinting.Drawing;
using DevExpress.XtraReports.UI;
using Hedgehog.Model;
using Hedgehog.Infrastructure.Reports;
using System.Linq;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.IO;

private void highlightAnswer(object sender, DevExpress.XtraReports.UI.PrintOnPageEventArgs e)
{
 	XRLabel lbl = (XRLabel) sender;

 	if (lbl.Text == "No")
 	{
 		lbl.ForeColor = Color.Red;
 	lbl.Font = new Font("Arial", 9.75F, FontStyle.Bold);
 		count++;
 	}
}

private void correctedDuringInspection(object sender, PrintEventArgs e)
{
 	XRCheckBox cb = (XRCheckBox) sender;

 	if (cb.Checked)
 		cb.Visible = true;
 	else
 		cb.Visible = false;
}

String currentAnswer = "";
int count = 0;

/*private void inViolation_SummaryGetResult(object sender, DevExpress.XtraReports.UI.SummaryGetResultEventArgs e) {
 int violationCount = 0; 
 
 Inspection inspection = (Inspection) hedgehogReport1.GetCurrentRow();

 if(inspection != null)
 { 
 violationCount = inspection.Pages.SelectMany(p => p.Questions).Count(q => q.TotalWeight > 0);
 }

 e.Result = violationCount;
 e.Handled = true;

}*/

private void answerTest_GetValue(object sender, DevExpress.XtraReports.UI.GetValueEventArgs e)
{
 if (answer.Text == "No") 
 	count++;
}

int i = 0;

private void PageHeader_BeforePrint(object sender, PrintEventArgs e)
{
 	i++;

 	if (i == 1)
 		e.Cancel = true;
}

private void cancelPrint(object sender, PrintEventArgs e)
{
 	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;

 	if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(label.Text))
 		e.Cancel = true;
}

private void status_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
 	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
 	
	Inspection inspection = (Inspection) hedgehogReport1.GetCurrentRow();

 	if (inspection.Status == InspectionStatus.Voided)
	{
 		hedgehogReport1.Watermark.Text = "VOID";
 		hedgehogReport1.Watermark.TextTransparency = 150;
 		hedgehogReport1.Watermark.ForeColor = Color.Red;
 	}
	else if (inspection.Status == InspectionStatus.Invalid || inspection.Status == InspectionStatus.Open)
	{
 		hedgehogReport1.Watermark.Text = "DRAFT";
 		hedgehogReport1.Watermark.ForeColor = Color.Black;
 		hedgehogReport1.Watermark.TextTransparency = 200;
 	}
	else
	{
 		hedgehogReport1.Watermark.Text = "";
 	}
}

private void cancelPrintIfNullTag(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
 	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
 	object t = label.Tag;

 	if (t == null)
 		e.Cancel = true;
}

private readonly string[] _pictureFormats = { ".jpg", ".jpeg", ".tiff", ".tif", ".png", ".gif", ".bmp" };

private readonly string _fileNotFoundMessage = "This attachment either couldn't be downloaded or was removed from the server. " +
	"If working offline, try running this report again when online.";

private readonly string _invalidImageFormatMessage = "This attachment is either not an image, or is an invalid image format.";

private void SetAttachmentErrorText(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRPictureBox picture = (XRPictureBox) sender;

	string errorText = "";
	string imageUrl = "";

	Note note = (Note) Attachments.GetCurrentRow();

	if (note != null)
	{
		string extension = Path.GetExtension(note.OriginalFileName);
	
		if (!_pictureFormats.Contains(extension))
		{
			errorText = _invalidImageFormatMessage;
		}
		else if (!File.Exists(note.AttachmentPath))
		{
			errorText = _fileNotFoundMessage;
		}
	}
	else
	{
		errorText = _fileNotFoundMessage;
	}

	if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(errorText))
	{
		AttachmentErrorText.Text = errorText;
		AttachmentErrorText.Visible = true;

		picture.Height = 0;
		AttachmentsDetail.Height = 75;

	}
	else
	{
		AttachmentErrorText.Visible = false;

		picture.Height = 365;
		AttachmentsDetail.Height = 415;

		picture.ImageUrl = note.AttachmentPath;
	}
}

private int _questionNumber = 1;

private void QuestionNumberLabel_AfterPrint(object sender, System.EventArgs e)
{
	SetAndIncrementQuestionNumber();
}

private void QuestionNumberLabel_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	if (_questionNumber == 1)
	{
		SetAndIncrementQuestionNumber();
	}
}

private void SetAndIncrementQuestionNumber()
{
	QuestionNumberLabel.Text = string.Format("{0}.", _questionNumber);

	_questionNumber++;
}

private void inspectionReasonsLabel_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	e.Cancel = string.IsNullOrEmpty(inspectionReasons.Text);
}

private void closingCommentsLabel_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	e.Cancel = string.IsNullOrEmpty(closingComments.Text);
}

private void openingCommentsLabel_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e) 
{
	e.Cancel = string.IsNullOrEmpty(openingComments.Text);
}

//todo
private void FacilityTypeHeaderLabel_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;

	InspectionPage page = (InspectionPage) PagesSubReport.GetCurrentRow();

	FacilityTypeAttribute facilityTypeAttribute = page.FacilityTypeAttribute;

	if (facilityTypeAttribute != null)
	{
		label.Text = string.Format("{0} - {1}", facilityTypeLabel.Text, facilityTypeAttribute.Description);
	}
	else
	{
		label.Text = facilityTypeLabel.Text;
	}
}


// bind question deatail band, canned comments subreport, readings supreport to this
private void CancelPrintIfNotInCompliance(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
 	InspectionQuestion question = (InspectionQuestion) QuestionsSubReport.GetCurrentRow();

 	if (question != null && !QuestionHasComplianceInformation(question))
 	{
 		e.Cancel = true;
 	}
}

private void GetReadingsDisplayText(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;

	Reading reading = (Reading) ReadingsSubReport.GetCurrentRow();

	string takenTimeString = reading.TakenDateTime.ToLocalTime().ToString("dd-MMM-yyyy HH:mm");

 string location = !string.IsNullOrEmpty(reading.Location)
		? string.Format(" at {0}", reading.Location)
		: string.Empty;

	label.Text = string.Format("- {0} - {1}{2}: {3}{4}",
		takenTimeString, reading.ItemMeasured, location, reading.Value, reading.Unit.Description);
}

//bind groupheader1 to this
private void CancelPrintCategoryHeader(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
 	Inspection inspection = (Inspection) hedgehogReport1.GetCurrentRow() ?? new Inspection();

 	InspectionQuestion currentQuestion = (InspectionQuestion) QuestionsSubReport.GetCurrentRow();

 	InspectionModelCategory currentCategory = new InspectionModelCategory();

 	if (currentQuestion != null)
 	{
 		currentCategory = currentQuestion.ModelQuestion.Category;
 	}

 	IEnumerable<InspectionQuestion> questionsInCurrentCategory = inspection.Pages.SelectMany(p => p.Questions).Where(q => q.ModelQuestion.CategoryId == currentCategory.Id);

 	if (questionsInCurrentCategory.All(q => !QuestionHasComplianceInformation(q)))
 	{
 		e.Cancel = true;
 	}
}

//bind reportHeader2 to this
private void CancelPrintReportHeader(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	Inspection inspection = (Inspection) hedgehogReport1.GetCurrentRow() ?? new Inspection();
	IEnumerable<InspectionQuestion> questions = inspection.Pages.SelectMany(p => p.Questions);

	if (inspection.Pages.SelectMany(p => p.Questions).All(q => !QuestionHasComplianceInformation(q)))
 	{ 
 		e.Cancel = true; 
	}
}

private bool QuestionHasComplianceInformation(InspectionQuestion question)
{
	return question.CannedComments.Any() ||
		!string.IsNullOrEmpty(question.Comment) ||
		question.HasOutOfComplianceData; 
}

private void amLabel2_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e) 
{
	if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(attachmentLabel.Text))
	{
		amLabel2.Text = "Amendments - Notes";
	}
}

private void CertifiedProfessionalLabel_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{	
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	
	if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(label.Text))
	{
		label.Text = "Certified Professionals:";
	}
	else
	{
		label.Text += ":";
	}
}

private void SeverityLabel_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;

	if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(label.Text))
	{
		label.Text = string.Format("Severity: {0}", label.Text);
	}
	else
	{
		e.Cancel = true;
	}
}

private void followUpDate_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;

	InspectionQuestion question = (InspectionQuestion) QuestionsSubReport.GetCurrentRow();

	if (question.FollowUpDate == null)
	{
		label.Height = 0;
		label.Text = string.Empty;
	}
}

private void InspectionStartDateTime_EvaluateBinding(object sender, DevExpress.XtraReports.UI.BindingEventArgs e)
{
	ToLocalTime(sender, e);
}

private void NoteAttachmentDateTime_EvaluateBinding(object sender, DevExpress.XtraReports.UI.BindingEventArgs e)
{
	ToLocalTime(sender, e);
}

private void NoteAmendmentDateTime_EvaluateBinding(object sender, DevExpress.XtraReports.UI.BindingEventArgs e)
{
	ToLocalTime(sender, e);
}

private void ToLocalTime(object sender, DevExpress.XtraReports.UI.BindingEventArgs e)
{
	if (e.Value == null)
		return;

	if (e.Value.GetType() != typeof(DateTimeOffset))
	{
		XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;

		string message = "Value is not bound to a DateTimeOffset. Report = " + label.RootReport.DisplayName + " Label = " + label.Name + " Type = " + e.Value.GetType().ToString() + " Value = " + e.Value.ToString();
		throw new ArgumentException(message);
	}

	DateTimeOffset beforeConverted = (DateTimeOffset) e.Value;
	e.Value = beforeConverted .ToLocalTime();
}

Report.Description: Displays the results of an inspection.
Report.Name: Inspection Report (Non-Compliant Questions)

Report.Definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <XtraReportsLayoutSerializer SerializerVersion="15.2.9.0" Ref="1" ControlType="Hedgehog.Infrastructure.Reports.HedgehogReport, Hedgehog.ReportEngine, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=6310a94c1eeb7c31" Name="hedgehogReport1" DisplayName="Summary - All Facilities (Risk Rating)" ScriptsSource="using System.Collections.Generic;
using Hedgehog.DigestModel;

Dictionary<string, double> counters = new Dictionary<string, double>();
int g1RunningTotal = 0;
int g2RunningTotal = 0;
int rRunningTotal = 0;

private void createDictionary(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e) {
	string[] keys = new string[] {
		"unassessed", "g2Unassessed", "g1Unassessed", "rUnassessed",
		"low", "g2Low", "g1Low", "rLow", 
		"moderate", "g2Moderate", "g1Moderate", "rModerate", 
		"high", "g2High", "g1High", "rHigh"
	};
	
	for (int i = 0; i < keys.Length; i++)
		counters.Add(keys[i], 0);
}

private void rowChanged(object sender, System.EventArgs e) {
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	string name = label.Name;

	string risk = ((FacilityDigest) GetCurrentRow()).RiskRating.ToString();
	
	if (risk == "Invalid")
		risk = "unassessed";

	List<string> keys = new List<string>(counters.Keys);

	foreach (string key in keys) {
		if (key.EndsWith(risk, true, null))
			counters[key]++;
	}

	g1RunningTotal++;
	g2RunningTotal++;
	rRunningTotal++;
}

private void getCount(object sender, DevExpress.XtraReports.UI.SummaryGetResultEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	string name = label.Name;
	e.Result = counters[name];
	e.Handled = true;
}

private void getPercent(object sender, DevExpress.XtraReports.UI.SummaryGetResultEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	string name = label.Name;
	name = name.Remove(name.IndexOf("Percent"));
	double divisor = counters["unassessed"] + counters["low"] + counters["moderate"] + counters["high"];
	double result = 0;
	if (divisor > 0)
		result = (counters[name] * 100) / divisor;

	if (result < 0.1 && result > 0)
		e.Result = "<0.1";
	else {
		result = Math.Round(result, 1);
		e.Result = result;
	}
	
	e.Handled = true;
}

private void getGroupPercent(object sender, DevExpress.XtraReports.UI.SummaryGetResultEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	string name = label.Name;
	name = name.Remove(name.IndexOf("Percent"));
	double divisor = 0;
	double result = 0;

	if (name.StartsWith("g1"))
		divisor = g1RunningTotal;
	else if (name.StartsWith("g2"))
		divisor = g2RunningTotal;
	else if (name.StartsWith("r"))
		divisor = rRunningTotal;

	if (divisor > 0)
		result = (counters[name] * 100) / divisor;
	
	if (result < 0.1 && result > 0)
		e.Result = "<0.1";
	else {
		result = Math.Round(result, 1);
		e.Result = result;
	}
	e.Handled = true;
}

private void reset(object sender, System.EventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	string name = label.Name;
	counters[name] = 0;
}

private void groupReset(object sender, System.EventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	string name = label.Name;

	if (name.StartsWith("g1"))
		g1RunningTotal = 0;
	else if (name.StartsWith("g2"))
		g2RunningTotal = 0;
}

private void checkIfEmpty(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	string name = label.Name;
	if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(label.Text) && name.StartsWith("g"))
		label.Text = "Unassigned Total:";
	else if(String.IsNullOrEmpty(label.Text))
		label.Text = "Unassigned";
}

Report.Description: Breakdown of all facilities by type and risk rating.
Report.Name: Summary - All Facilities (Risk Rating)

Report.Definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <XtraReportsLayoutSerializer SerializerVersion="15.2.9.0" Ref="1" ControlType="Hedgehog.Infrastructure.Reports.HedgehogReport, Hedgehog.ReportEngine, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=6310a94c1eeb7c31" Name="_report" DisplayName="Summary - Time Tracking" ScriptsSource="using System.Collections.Generic;
using Hedgehog.DigestModel;

//dictionary of count summaries
Dictionary<string, double> counters = new Dictionary<string, double>();
int g1RunningTotal = 0;
int g2RunningTotal = 0;
int rRunningTotal = 0;

//fill dictionary
private void createDictionary(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e) {
	string[] keys = new string[] {
		"unassessed", "g2Unassessed", "g1Unassessed", "rUnassessed",
		"low", "g2Low", "g1Low", "rLow", 
		"moderate", "g2Moderate", "g1Moderate", "rModerate", 
		"high", "g2High", "g1High", "rHigh"
	};
	
	for (int i = 0; i < keys.Length; i++)
		counters.Add(keys[i], 0);
}

//increment counts
private void rowChanged(object sender, System.EventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;

	string name = label.Name;
	string hours = ((TimeEntryDigest) GetCurrentRow()).Hours;
	List<string> keys = new List<string>(counters.Keys);

	foreach (string key in keys)
	{
		counters[key] += TimeSpan.Parse(hours).TotalHours;
	}

	g1RunningTotal++;
	g2RunningTotal++;
	rRunningTotal++;
}

//get count summary
private void getCount(object sender, DevExpress.XtraReports.UI.SummaryGetResultEventArgs e) {
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	string name = label.Name;

	e.Result = counters[name];
	e.Handled = true;
}

//reset count
private void reset(object sender, System.EventArgs e) {
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	string name = label.Name;
	counters[name] = 0;
}

private void groupReset(object sender, System.EventArgs e) {
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	string name = label.Name;

	if (name.StartsWith("g1"))
		g1RunningTotal = 0;
	else if (name.StartsWith("g2"))
		g2RunningTotal = 0;

	counters[name] = 0;
}

private void checkIfEmpty(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e) {
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	string name = label.Name;
	if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(label.Text) && name.StartsWith("g"))
		label.Text = "Group Total:";
	else if(String.IsNullOrEmpty(label.Text))
		label.Text = "Empty";
}

private void TruncateFacilityNumber(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e)
{
	XRLabel lbl = (XRLabel) sender;
	string text = lbl.Text;
	
	if (text.Contains("["))
		lbl.Text = text.Substring(0, text.LastIndexOf('['));
}

Dictionary<string, double> totals = new Dictionary<string, double>();

private void reportedDate_EvaluateBinding(object sender, DevExpress.XtraReports.UI.BindingEventArgs e)
{
	ToLocalTime(sender, e);
}

{
	ToLocalTime(sender, e);
}

{
	ToLocalTime(sender, e);
}

private void createDictionary(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e) {
	string[] keys = new string[] {"reported", "activity", "resolution", "total",
		"g1reported", "g1activity", "g1resolution", "g1total",
		"g2reported", "g2activity", "g2resolution", "g2total",
		"g3reported", "g3activity", "g3resolution", "g3total",
		"count", "g1Count", "g2Count", "g3Count"};
	
	for (int i = 0; i < keys.Length; i++)
		totals.Add(keys[i], 0);
}

private void getElapsedTime(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e) {
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	string name = label.Name;

	DateTime minuend = new DateTime();
	DateTime subtrahend = new DateTime();
	DateTimeOffset minuendOffset = new DateTimeOffset();
	DateTimeOffset subtrahendOffset = new DateTimeOffset();

	if (occurrenceDate.Tag == null && reportedDate.Tag != null)
		subtrahendOffset = (DateTimeOffset) reportedDate.Tag;
	else if (occurrenceDate.Tag == null && reportedDate.Tag == null)
		subtrahendOffset = DateTimeOffset.UtcNow;
	else
		subtrahendOffset = (DateTimeOffset) occurrenceDate.Tag;

	subtrahend = subtrahendOffset.DateTime;
	
	if (String.Compare(name, "reported") == 0 && reportedDate.Tag != null)
		minuendOffset = (DateTimeOffset) reportedDate.Tag;
	else if (String.Compare(name, "activity") == 0 && activityDate.Tag != null)
		minuendOffset = (DateTimeOffset) activityDate.Tag;
	else if (String.Compare(name, "resolution") == 0 && resolutionDate.Tag != null)
		minuendOffset = (DateTimeOffset) resolutionDate.Tag;
	else if (String.Compare(name, "total") == 0) {
		if (resolutionDate.Tag == null)
			minuendOffset = DateTimeOffset.UtcNow;
		else
			minuendOffset = (DateTimeOffset) resolutionDate.Tag;
	}

	minuend = minuendOffset.DateTime;

	TimeSpan interval = minuend.Subtract(subtrahend);
	double elapsedTime = interval.TotalHours;

	if (elapsedTime < 0)
		elapsedTime = 0;

	elapsedTime = Math.Round(elapsedTime, 1);

	totals[name] += elapsedTime;
	totals["g1" + name] += elapsedTime;
	totals["g2" + name] += elapsedTime;
	totals["g3" + name] += elapsedTime;
	
	totals["count"]++;
	totals["g1Count"]++;
	totals["g2Count"]++;
	totals["g3Count"]++;

	label.Text = elapsedTime.ToString();
}

private void getAverageTime(object sender, DevExpress.XtraReports.UI.SummaryGetResultEventArgs e) {
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	string name = label.Name;
	name = name.Remove(name.IndexOf("Avg"));
	double result = 0, count = 0, total = 0;

	if (name.StartsWith("g")) {
		total = totals[name];
		name = name.Remove(2);
		count = totals[String.Concat(name, "Count")];
	} else {
		count = totals["count"];
		total = totals[name];
	}

	if (count > 0)
		result = total / (count / 4);
	
	e.Result = Math.Round(result, 1);
	e.Handled = true;
}

private void reset(object sender, System.EventArgs e) {
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	string name = label.Name;
	name = name.Remove(2);
	totals[String.Concat(name, "reported")] = 0;
	totals[String.Concat(name, "activity")] = 0;
	totals[String.Concat(name, "resolution")] = 0;
	totals[String.Concat(name, "total")] = 0;
	totals[String.Concat(name, "Count")] = 0;
}

private void checkIfEmpty(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e) {
	XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;
	string name = label.Name;
	if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(label.Text) && name.StartsWith("g"))
		label.Text = "Averages for Unassessed:";
	else if(String.IsNullOrEmpty(label.Text))
		label.Text = "Unassessed";
}

private void ToLocalTime(object sender, DevExpress.XtraReports.UI.BindingEventArgs e)
{
	if (e.Value == null)
		return;

	if (e.Value.GetType() != typeof(DateTimeOffset))
	{
		XRLabel label = (XRLabel) sender;

		string message = "Value is not bound to a DateTimeOffset. Report = " + label.RootReport.DisplayName + " Label = " + label.Name + " Type = " + e.Value.GetType().ToString() + " Value = " + e.Value.ToString();
		throw new ArgumentException(message);
	}

	DateTimeOffset beforeConverted = (DateTimeOffset) e.Value;
	e.Value = beforeConverted .ToLocalTime();
}

Report.Definition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <XtraReportsLayoutSerializer SerializerVersion="15.2.9.0" Ref="1" ControlType="Hedgehog.Infrastructure.Reports.HedgehogReport, Hedgehog.ReportEngine, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=6310a94c1eeb7c31" Name="hedgehogReport1" DisplayName="Graph - All Facilities (Risk Rating)" ScriptsSource="using Hedgehog.Model;

private void DrawSeriesPoint(object sender, DevExpress.XtraCharts.CustomDrawSeriesPointEventArgs e)
{
	if (e.SeriesPoint.Argument.ToString() == Rating.Low.ToString())
	{
		e.SeriesDrawOptions.Color = System.Drawing.Color.Green;
	}
	else if (e.SeriesPoint.Argument.ToString() == Rating.Moderate.ToString())
	{
		e.SeriesDrawOptions.Color = System.Drawing.Color.Yellow;
	}
	else if (e.SeriesPoint.Argument.ToString() == Rating.High.ToString())
	{
		e.SeriesDrawOptions.Color = System.Drawing.Color.Red;
	}
	else
	{
		e.SeriesDrawOptions.Color = System.Drawing.Color.Gray;
	}

	((Pie3DDrawOptions)e.SeriesDrawOptions).FillStyle.FillMode = FillMode3D.Solid;
}
